title: can't accept a match [ images included ]
body:
whenever I try to start a game, after click find match and clicking accept I got this problem ( images below), and am being punished for things I didn't do, btw it started happening after I made this new update. please hep.
1- http://imgur.com/XBNUVB1
2- http://imgur.com/2ymH7RH
3- http://imgur.com/4oiHVCL
thank you

replies.body:
This helped me:
"idk much 'bout win 8.1 but with similar issue on win 7 i've managed to get rid off by going to services.msc and disabling IP HELPER. U can check if there is something like that on win 8 mby it will help you. If not i have no idea but then i wold probably reinstall the game or the whole system.
good luck"
originally posted at: http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=770051
I am having the same problem just update client and i cant accept an match my connection is fine never had this problem before the update

Declining too many matches found can result in a queue dodge penalty, and is considered as a negative experience to those trying to queue for a match.  Regarding the issue itself, when you find a match our server needs to group everyone together and place them in the same instance.  Something is preventing you from joining that group and leaving you behind.  

Even though this is on the updated client, the issue is generally a result of a network problem.  To help rule out possibilities, my advice would be to go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is holding on tightly.  Hopefully, that will fix the issue up!
